package.name: ultrasn0w
package.shortDescription: iPhone Dev Team's iPhone 4, 3G and 3GS software unlock, now with added PwnApple.

descriptionlist.description: Compatible with iPhone 4 baseband 01.59.00 and iPhone 3G/3GS basebands 04.26.08, 05.11.07, 05.12.01, 05.13.04 and 06.15.00! Thanks to @sherif_hashim and @Oranav for contributing baseband crashes.
Tested on iPhone 3G (iOS 4.2.1), iPhone 3GS (iOS 5.1.1 & iOS 6.1.2 & iOS 6.1.3) and iPhone 4 (iOS 5.1 & iOS 6.0.1 & iOS 6.1.2) but should on all iOS versions from 3.0-6.1.6.
